buginformation.summary: [Bug] 使用电击使磁场控制时闪退
buginformation.description: 我在提出 Issue 前搜寻到了类似的 #808 但是显然它没有得到正确的处理。 我将铁栅栏扔到了由[MmmMmmMmmMmm](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/mmmmmmmmmmmm) 提供的不掉血人偶上。 通常情况下这个人偶被攻击后会显示此次攻击的伤害，而且前面的普通电击技能也能对该人偶正常释放。 我在正常普通的Forge服务器(Minecraft 1.12.2, 详细信息见下)执行了如上操作，之后所有人掉线，显示"服务器已关闭"，后台日志显示服务器崩溃。 并且再次启动服务器后，我复现了这一问题（x 以下是导出的全部`log`，包含了安装的模组等信息，可供参考。 <https://paste.ubuntu.com/p/j5Cc8sYWwm/> ``` ---- Minecraft Crash Report ---- // I let you down. Sorry :( Time: 2019-08-24 15:49:42 CST Description: Ticking entity java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Cannot get property PropertyInteger{name=layers, clazz=class java.lang.Integer, values=[1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8]} as it does not exist in BlockStateContainer{block=minecraft:air, properties=[]} at net.minecraft.block.state.BlockStateContainer$StateImplementation.getValue(BlockStateContainer.java:201) at net.minecraft.block.BlockSnow.isReplaceable(BlockSnow.java:159) at cn.academy.entity.EntityBlock$1.onEvent(EntityBlock.java:151) at cn.academy.entity.EntityBlock$1.onEvent(EntityBlock.java:135) at cn.lambdalib2.util.entityx.EntityX.postEvent(EntityX.java:121) at cn.lambdalib2.util.entityx.handlers.Rigidbody.onUpdate(Rigidbody.java:72) at cn.lambdalib2.util.entityx.EntityX.update(EntityX.java:53) at cn.lambdalib2.util.entityx.EntityAdvanced.onUpdate(EntityAdvanced.java:31) at cn.academy.entity.EntityBlock.onUpdate(EntityBlock.java:113) at cn.academy.entity.MagManipEntityBlock.onUpdate(MagManipEntityBlock.java:121) at net.minecraft.world.World.updateEntityWithOptionalForce(World.java:1993) at net.minecraft.world.WorldServer.updateEntityWithOptionalForce(WorldServer.java:832) at net.minecraft.world.World.updateEntity(World.java:1955) at net.minecraft.world.World.redirect$updateEntity$zbd000(World.java:5118) at net.minecraft.world.World.updateEntities(World.java:1759) at net.minecraft.world.WorldServer.updateEntities(WorldServer.java:613) at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.updateTimeLightAndEntities(MinecraftServer.java:767) at net.minecraft.server.dedicated.DedicatedServer.updateTimeLightAndEntities(DedicatedServer.java:397) at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.tick(MinecraftServer.java:668) at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:526) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:748) A detailed walkthrough of the error, its code path and all known details is as follows: --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -- Entity being ticked -- Entity Type: academy:magmanipentityblock (cn.academy.entity.MagManipEntityBlock) Entity ID: 293140 Entity Name: entity.MagManipEntityBlock.name Entity's Exact location: 3102.54, 100.14, -3043.20 Entity's Block location: World: (3102,100,-3044), Chunk: (at 14,6,12 in 193,-191; contains blocks 3088,0,-3056 to 3103,255,-3041), Region: (6,-6; contains chunks 192,-192 to 223,-161, blocks 3072,0,-3072 to 3583,255,-2561) Entity's Momentum: -0.12, -0.47, -0.69 Entity's Passengers: [] Entity's Vehicle: ~~ERROR~~ NullPointerException: null Entity NBT:
